project_preview_description.text: A basic web app designed to store contact details of persons using Firebase data base and Angular framework

project_description.text: Contact App is basic web app which allows users to save their friends and family contact information online. The user can access the contact info from any platform all they need is a web browser.
This app is build using Angular framework. Also, app allows user to easily navigate between pages.
Navigate to code in cmd and run npm install to install node packages
In angular cli run ng serve contactApp --sourceMap=true
The website is live at https://contactbookjs.herokuapp.com/ Demo username: test@test.com Demo password: testtest
The app was designed for a simple task storing contact info of user in the database, so that users can check their contact info from any platform either desktop or phone.
